__e: I've known you for decades and I've never seen your dear daughter.
You saved my life... by introducing me to Jesus, and I found out that I could actually have a better life than the life I thought I wanted.
"Hey, I know stuff's been weird with us," "but Charlie introduced me to someone" "and it's serious, so I won't be bothering you anymore."
I think you did. I think somewhere inside, that's why you let me in. That's why you introduced me to your son.
For the good of the kids...
If her coach introduced them, why isn't he here?
- He only had two arms and one head, and called himself Phil, but...
Particularly if you presented yourself as a family man.
When Sarah came to see me and introduced herself as Nora Walker's daughter, for a split second, I was afraid she was there to tell me that you had died.
She actually pointed us towards a possible suspect that, uh, we missed the first time around.
Several months ago you introduced me to a friend of yours, an officer...
It wasn't until the end of the morning, that the government presented an action plan.
You are definitely not that person.. ..as whom you have introduced yourself to me.
Why is it that you know him that well, but you still introduced him to me?
You mean nobody else has come forward to say they saw him?
I suppose he was angry because Father filed a complaint.
And still you don't file a complaint in the police station.
He introduced a new way of seeing the world.
Well, last time he came he sprang a fiance and a step-daughter on us.
He knows about my furlough, and I haven't even filed a request yet.
